mapper.select: SELECT r.data_scope FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.is_delete = 0

SELECT r.id, r.NAME, r.LEVEL, r.description, r.data_scope, r.create_by, r.update_by, r.create_time, r.update_time, r.is_delete FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.is_delete = 0 AND r.is_delete = 0 AND u.id = #{userId}

SELECT r.id AS roleId, r.`name` AS roleName, r.`level` AS level, r.description AS description, r.data_scope AS dataScope, r.create_by AS roleCreateBy, r.update_by AS roleUpdateBy, r.create_time AS roleCreateTime, r.update_time AS roleUpdateTime, m.id AS menuId, m.pid AS menuPid, m.sub_count AS subCount, m.type AS type, m.title AS title, m.`name` AS menuName, m.component AS component, m.icon AS icon, m.path AS path, m.i_frame AS iFrame, m.`cache` AS menuCache, m.hidden AS hidden, m.permission AS permission, m.sort AS sort, m.create_by AS menuCreateBy, m.update_by AS menuUpdateBy, m.create_time AS menuCreateTime, m.update_time AS menuUpdateTime FROM `sys_role` r, `sys_roles_menus` rm, `sys_menu` m WHERE r.is_delete = 0 AND m.is_delete = 0 AND r.id = rm.role_id AND rm.menu_id = m.id
AND r.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{role.name},'%')
AND r.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{role.description},'%')
AND r.data_scope LIKE CONCAT('%',#{role.dataScope},'%')
